card.card: {"item":{"at_control":"","category":"daily","description":"作为九九组的前辈，你一直带领着九九组的大家和舞台创造科的大家一路前行，如饰演的角色名一般，你成为了大家的光默默保护着大家。 而终于，你的光也降临到你的身边，替我们大家保护你，陪伴你。希望您能在这光芒下无惧前行。两个人在一起的话，幸福之雨也会降临的吧。\n三森すずこさん、ご結婚おめでとうございます。","id":19270569,"is_fav":0,"pictures":[{"img_height":1280,"img_size":193.88,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/353c116e2911122ee358b5a1baa5ab1edfc25a9d.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":962},{"img_height":1477,"img_size":206.14,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/0f67638541788f45bcee2535357f058e69f8903f.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1109},{"img_height":1920,"img_size":213.08,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/c0a0949d7c0e508f23c556dacaf00579f0fedfca.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1336},{"img_height":1200,"img_size":90.15000000000001,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/61784385e5b7edb018284a27cecfa1651dd07f10.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":901},{"img_height":471,"img_size":49.43,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/f90ef2944f5eea6848df2727e676f007b8431324.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":624}],"pictures_count":5,"reply":165,"role":[],"settings":{"copy_forbidden":"0"},"source":[],"title":"","upload_time":1555041276},"user":{"head_url":"https:\/\/i1.hdslb.com\/bfs\/face\/7626da8b83eb3872860f9f9c7496a8f800c480b1.jpg","name":"圣翔音乐学院放送科","uid":234441166,"vip":{"avatar_subscript":0,"due_date":1579017600000,"label":{"label_theme":"","path":"","text":""},"nickname_color":"","status":0,"theme_type":0,"type":1,"vip_pay_type":0}}}
